block_comment: The block of code is used to configure the data generation pattern, specifically when the `DATA_PATTERN` value is "DGEN_ADDR" or "DGEN_ALL". This is achieved through a conditional check within the generated statement. The 'generate' clause is used to create configuration-based RTL that allows a specific piece of hardware logic to be activated or deactivated based on the condition specified. In this case, it checks if `DATA_PATTERN` is equal to either "DGEN_ADDR" or "DGEN_ALL", if so, it begins a block labelled `ADDRESS_PATTERN`.
